text: The <extra_id_0> GATA-3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> clone ( BC003070 ) complete cDNA was obtained from Invitrogen Life Technologies as a 5' - EcoRI / 3'-XhoI insert of <extra_id_0> GATA-3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in the pOTB7 vector .

<extra_id_0> GATA-3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was excised from pOTB7 using <extra_id_0> XhoI <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> digestion and pEGFP-C2 ( Clontech , Saint-Germain-en-Laye , France ) was digested with <extra_id_0> BamHI <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .

DNA was recovered by phenol extraction and ethanol precipitation , and both the <extra_id_0> GATA-3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> fragment and the pEGFP-C2 vector blunt-ended by incubation with Klenow ( Bioline Bio-27029 ) for 30 min at 37degreesC .
Klenow was inactivated by incubation for 10 min at 75degreesC .

DNA was recovered by phenol extraction and ethanol precipitation , and both the blunt-ended <extra_id_0> GATA-3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> fragment and the <extra_id_0> GFP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> vector were subsequently digested with <extra_id_0> EcoRI <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> before the 5'-EcoRI / 3'-blunt end <extra_id_0> GATA-3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> fragment was inserted into the 5'-EcoRI / 3'-blunt ended <extra_id_0> GFP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> vector .
Positive clones were confirmed by digestion and size analysis by 1 % agarose gel electrophoresis and by sequencing .
